attributes.action: Publish data on illegal migrant crime
attributes.additional_details: The Home Office recently denied requests to publish the data, claiming the public doesn't want the information. A public petition would be a fair way to determine whether this is true.
attributes.background: In recent years, we have seen an unprecedented explosion in illegal migration. The public has a right to understand the true implications of this migration and its impact on society and crime levels. Given the recent tensions, public transparency is now more critical than ever.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Collect and Publish statistics on crimes committed by illegal immigrants
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709094
